text.text: "Tank drone, meet the real deal.  See how you handle 120 millimeters of HELL YEAH!"
"big fucking gun, earplugs are good for your brain"
"I have a bicycle-mounted tank cannon.  Your argument is invalid."
"Next person to call this infantry fighting vehicle a 'tank' is walking home."
"Found what used to be an armored platoon.  I don't want to find out what did them in."
